author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: هذا الأَمْرِ مَنْ كانَ قابِلاً لاسْمِكَ وَسُلْطانِكَ، لِيَذْكرَنِي بَيْنَ خَلْقِكَ وَيَرْفَعَ أَعْلامَ نَصْرِكَ فِي مَمْلَكَتِكَ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ المُقْتَدِرُ
translation: Raise up, I implore Thee, O my God, as helpers to this Revelation such as shall be counted worthy of Thy name and of Thy sovereignty, that they may remember me among Thy creatures, and hoist the ensigns of Thy victory in Thy land.
